mapper.select: select id, student_name studentName, school_id schoolId, picture, video, is_show shows from t_open_style where is_delete=0 and student_name like '%${studentName}%' limit #{dataNum},#{limit}
select id, student_name studentName, school_id schoolId, picture, video, is_show show from t_open_style where is_delete=0 and id=#{id}
